titleStmt.title: A treatie of the churche conteining a true discourse, to knowe the true church by, and to discerne it from the Romish church, and all other false assemblies, or counterfet congregations / vvritten by M. Bertrande de Loque ... ; and faithfully translated out of French into English, by T.VV.
titleStmt.author: Loque, Bertrand de.

publicationStmt.publisher: For Richard Langton, dwelling in Swythins Lane, and there they are to be solde,
